title: Futura look-alike?
content:
Caught this one off of Kate Spade's site, they use it here and there and I'm trying to find out exactly what it is. My guesses were Futura Medium or Neutra No. 2, but its neither. Anyone have any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107161924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WHATISIT_3930.jpg)
author: timlahan

comments.content:
I think I've found it: Futura Serie BQ Medium Small Caps. What a mouthful!

[http://www.trademark-trademark.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107161924/http:/www.trademark-trademark.com/ "http://www.trademark-trademark.com")

Oh wow. I wasn’t aware of a Futura with SC.  
Intersting being used as real caps here.

This is very good to know. Thank you very much.

---  
Flxb
